el:identity.el:title: Hobbyte II, the return
el:identity.el:subtitle: The hobbyte and Sarumarble the White

el:english.el:comment: In Tolkien's 'the Lord of the Rings', the white magician is called 'Saruman'. Gandalf is gray so does not fit in this story, sorry. Saruman can transform himself in whatever he wants.

el:string.el:english: Up there in Orthanc I see Sarumarble the White, the mightiest magician of this Country. He made the Ring. He masters metamorphosis. He could help me. If only I could enter the Castle!
el:string.el:translation: Là-bas en Orthanc est Sarouballe le Blanc, grand parmi les magiciens. C'est lui qui a fabriqué l'Anneau. On le dit capable de se transformer. Il saurait sûrement comment m'aider. Si seulement je pouvais entrer en son Castel!
